content: place head seam side down onto pipe cleaner and sew head in place 4 sew ears to sides of head according to fig 3 two row behind eyes on sides of head 5 weave in all ends embellishments 1 horns a cut a loop of darker yarn approximately 6 inches long fold in half b using f hook one row in front of ears insert hook under post of single_crochet fig 5 grab cut piece of yarn at fold pull loop through yo with both ends of the darker yarn chain 2 c finish off and tie a knot at the end cut both strings close to the knot to finish 2 tail a cut a loop of darker yarn approximately 10 inches long fold in half b follow same directions as horns placing tail on behind of giraffe and chain 5 instead of 2 c finish off as with horns 3 mane a insert hook under post of a single_crochet between ears just behind horns b pull up loop of darker colored yarn c work a single_crochet in this stitch chain 1 *work a single_crochet around the post of the single_crochet 1 row down the back of the head toward body chain 1 repeat from * down the neck to where the neck joins the back d finish off leaving a tail and weave in ends of yarn abbreviations chain chain yo yarn over single_crochet single_crochet round round 2 single_crochet decrease insert hook into next stitch yo pull up loop insert hook into next stitch yo pull up loop yo pull loop through all three loops on hook also known as single_crochet decrease sl slip_stitch single_crochet sl decrease - insert hook in next single_crochet yo pull up loop insert hook into next single_crochet yo pull up loop and pull through 2 loops on hook copyright © 2008 andrea moberly this pattern may not be sold or distributed items created from this pattern may not be used for internet sales but may be sold locally figures figure 1 a tie new color to old color with a knot b with two loops of last stitch of row still on hook yo with new color c pull new color through both loops of old color on hook cut off old color leaving a short tail stuff tails of both colors inside foot no sewing in of ends is needed figure 2 figure 4 shown chain 3 for foundation chain of ear lying on its side 1 single_crochet worked in back post of stitch ends of leg tubes together flat by foundation chain the arrow is pointing to inserting hook through both layers to work next back post to be worked single_crochet figure 3 figure 5 insert hook under post of single_crochet to make horns view of face for placement of eyes ears and horns tapestry crochet for right-handed crochet in the indicated row you will begin to carry the darker color being able to carry colors is essential for tapestry crochet
